creator: ken.blackler@jrc.it
text:
The setup document is a bit misleading here as it really implies that one 
NEEDS a cocoon webapp setup, rather than just a local copy of all the files to 
build from....

I would remove the link and sentence: "See also Installing Apache Cocoon" from 
the page http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/installation/source_version.html

and add a sentence to the prerequisites page 
(http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/installation/prerequisites.html) like:

"Apache Cocoon (required: Cocoon 2.1.4)
Cocoon download page. Note that Cocoon is needed when building the source 
version of Lenya, but the resulting Lenya webapp is completely self contained 
and therefore it does not need the Cocoon webapp to be installed. See the FAQ 
for details of configuration changes required when running multiple Cocoon 
based applications."

Oh, and a mention in the FAQ!
